articles.title: Rapper Young Thug to go to trial in gang, racketeering case - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: ATLANTA (AP) — Rapper Young Thug, accused by prosecutors  of co-founding a criminal street gang responsible for violent crimes and using his songs and social media to promote it, is set to go to trial starting Monday.
